title: 'F1 title decider could hardly be better set up'
subtitle: The maths and task seem simple for Lando Norris heading into the F1 title decider  but Max Verstappen retains hope of "some Abu Dhabi magic".
full_text: The maths and task seem simple for Lando Norris heading into the F1 title decider  but Max Verstappen retains hope of "some Abu Dhabi magic".
